summary.purpose: Global TypeScript type definitions for application-wide utilities: text direction, state setters, modal popups, and app identifiers.
summary.problem_solved: Provides reusable type definitions for common patterns across the application (RTL/LTR direction, React setState patterns, modal configuration, app names and login options).

exports.name: Direction
exports.description_one_line: Text direction union type for RTL and LTR layouts.

exports.name: SetState
exports.description_one_line: React useState setter type with updater function or direct value.

exports.name: ModularPopUp
exports.description_one_line: Modal popup configuration with element, positioning, and callbacks.

exports.name: AppName
exports.description_one_line: Application identifier union for installer, toolbox, and dashboard.

exports.name: LoginOption
exports.description_one_line: Login method union for Google and phone-based authentication.

details.what_it_does: Union type restricting direction values to 'rtl' (right-to-left for Hebrew/Arabic) or 'ltr' (left-to-right for English/Latin).

minimal_correct.title: Use Direction type in component props

details.what_it_does: Generic type T for useState setter that accepts either a function receiving previous state and returning new state, or a new value directly.
details.type_definition: type SetState<T> = (updater: ((prev: T) => T) | T) => void;

minimal_correct.title: Use SetState in function signature

symbols.name: ModularPopUp
symbols.description_one_line: Modal popup configuration with element, positioning, and callbacks.

details.what_it_does: Union type for null (no popup) or object with JSX.Element, optional name, close callback, CSS positioning (top/bottom/left/right), and background color.

minimal_correct.title: Create and display modal popup

details.what_it_does: Union type restricting app identifiers to 'installer', 'toolbox', or 'dashboard' for permission and feature gating.

minimal_correct.title: Use AppName for permission checking

details.what_it_does: Union type restricting login methods to 'google' (OAuth) or 'phone' (SMS/OTP).

minimal_correct.title: Track login method in audit
